text: Taona! Gulu lina limene lidali pakati pawo lidati, “Inu anthu a ku Yasrib simungawagonjetse awa ayi kotero bwererani m’mbuyo!” Ndipo kagulu kena kamapempha chilolezo kwa Mtumwi ndipo kadati, “Ndithudi nyumba zathu zilibe woziteteza.” Koma sizinali choncho ayi koma kuti iwo amangofuna kupeza njira yothawira
